name: Fortem
description:
Known as "Connect Four", "Vier gewinnt" (German), "Conecta 4" (Spanish) or "Puissance 4" (French), you now can play it with your friends online or by yourself against the AI!

Play Connect Four as Fortem on the computer.

Features:

  • Play against others on one machine or via LAN or internet.
  • Play against three different AIs.
  • Choose names and colours.
  • Chat with your friend when you play.
  • Works well on Windows and Linux

If you want to help with translation have a look at my Github page Fortem Translation, where you can find the latest translation files for the game. I am looking forward for a pull request!
